name: src/0-core/0-base/Measure.js
zero
description: Returns the zero measure according to the monoid.

name: measure
description:
Returns the measure of an element. Must be implemented by classes
extending Measure

:straight_ruler: [@functional-abstraction/measure](https://functional-abstraction.github.io/measure) ==


Bartosz Milewski's Programming Cafe / CC BY 4.0

Monoids and measures for JavaScript. See [docs](https://functional-abstraction.github.io/measure). ```js class Monoid a where 0 :: => a + :: a => a => a ``` name: ./doc/manual/installation.md
content:
# Installation
Can be managed using
[jspm](http://jspm.io)
or [npm](https://github.com/npm/npm).

### jspm
```terminal
jspm install npm:@functional-abstraction/measure
```

### npm
```terminal
npm install @functional-abstraction/measure --save
```
